Some Important commands

$git fetch origin

$git log origin/angular6_Express_combine //Gives if any one push code to GIT

$git status

$git fetch origin

$git diff --name-status origin/angular6_Express_combine> //Lists Files

$git diff origin/angular6_Express_combine//Lists real differences

$git checkout  -b new_features//checkout to new branch and shift control to new branch

$git pull origin angular6_Express_combine/

HOW TO INSTALL NODE/ANGULAR?

>Download node from - https://nodejs.org/en/download/

>node -v ; npm –v , ng -v (to know version of node package manager)

>npm install –g @angular/cli (globally install npm)

HOW TO CREATE A CLIENT PROJECT?

> ng new project-name

> npm start    (Starts client side related methods -  http://localhost:4200/)

>ng serve (it opens the port in 4200)

> ng serve --port 4201 (port identification)

>npm install (if any error after project setup)

>cd project-name

>ng serve -o (run the app and open in a window http://localhost:4200/)

HOW TO CREATE A COMPONENT?

> ng generate component home (home component name)

HOW TO CREATE A SERVER SIDE PROJECT?

> npm init (creates package.json  creates packages, asks name for a package - app.js)

>npm install express --save (create express dependencies or services related to server  (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L6_CoHNSbwc)

>npm install mongoose cors body-parser --save (create mongoose dependencies or services related to DB)

>create app.js (Write Business logic for DB connection and Server – to activate DB and Server /api http://localhost:3000/api/)

> create models.js

>create route.js

Current Affair PROJECT

1) DB AND SERVER (MIDDLE WARE TO CONNECT CLIENT WITH DB)  

E: gprojects

E: gprojects> mkdir current-affairs

E: gprojects\current-affairs> npm init                (creates package.json  creates packages asks name for a package - app.js - open Visual Studio  see package.json 

E: gprojects\current-affairs> npm install express --save (create express dependencies or services related to server -  https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=L6_CoHNSbwc

E: gprojects\current-affairs> npm install mongoose cors body-parser --save (create mongoose dependencies or services related to DB)

E: gprojects\current-affairs> create app.js (Write Business logic for DB connection and Server – to activate DB and Server /api http://localhost:3000/api/)

E: gprojects\current-affairs> mkdir models, create createnews.js (for creating a schema in mongoDB)

E: gprojects\current-affairs>mkdir routes, create route.js             (Business logic to save news in MongoDB – CRUD operations /api/createNews)

 

CLIENT SIDE

E: gprojects\current-affairs>ng new CA-client  (create a project called - current affair client side)

E: gprojects\current-affairs\CA-client> npm start    (Starts client side related methods -  http://localhost:4200/)

E: gprojects\current-affairs\CA-client> ng g component ca-editor (create html, css, ts files for CA editor FRONEND)

E: gprojects\current-affairs\CA-client> ng g service contact (keep Business logic for CRUD operations)

E: gprojects\current-affairs\CA-client> ng serve  (Compile new angular code and activate http://localhost:4200/)
